TESTING ORIGINAL ISSUE FIX
==================================================
Testing original issue scenario...
Original issue: HPacker with align='bottom' should align rectangles to bottom

Scenario: Two rectangles with heights [20, 30]
Container height: 30

align='bottom' result: offsets=[0, 0]
Rectangle positions:
  Rectangle 1 (height=20): bottom=0, top=20
  Rectangle 2 (height=30): bottom=0, top=30
✓ FIXED: Both rectangles are aligned to the bottom as expected!

align='top' result: offsets=[10, 0]
Rectangle positions:
  Rectangle 1 (height=20): bottom=10, top=30
  Rectangle 2 (height=30): bottom=0, top=30
✓ FIXED: Both rectangles are aligned to the top as expected!

🎉 SUCCESS: The original issue has been fixed!

============================================================
BEFORE AND AFTER COMPARISON
============================================================
BEFORE (buggy behavior):
  align='top': offsets=[0, 0]
    Rectangle 1: bottom=0, top=20
    Rectangle 2: bottom=0, top=30
  align='bottom': offsets=[10, 0]
    Rectangle 1: bottom=10, top=30
    Rectangle 2: bottom=0, top=30

AFTER (fixed behavior):
  align='top': offsets=[10, 0]
    Rectangle 1: bottom=10, top=30
    Rectangle 2: bottom=0, top=30
  align='bottom': offsets=[0, 0]
    Rectangle 1: bottom=0, top=20
    Rectangle 2: bottom=0, top=30
